Pre-Game Insights: Javier Aguirre will be managing his first game in his third spell as head coach of Mexico.
Mexico is coming off a poor performance at the Copa America, where they were eliminated at the group stage.
Mexico is one of the three hosts for the 2026 World Cup alongside the United States and Canada.
Mexico has not faced New Zealand since a 2-1 victory in the FIFA Confederations Cup of 2017.
Experts predict a comfortable win for Mexico with a score prediction of 3-0.
